name: Idle Battle RPG
description:
Idle Battle RPG is a unique combination of idle game with RPG elements. Fight with enormous monsters, upgrade your stats and equipment, and use prestige to get permanent power ups. But remember that once your are dead the journey starts from the very beginning!

GAMEPLAY

Idle fights with various features and possibility to create your own character. Many levels and difficulty tiers with higher rewards and stronger enemies!

UPGRADES

Upgrade 6 base attributes to power up 12 passive stats. More damage and armor or fast critical attacks? It's up to you!

PRESTIGE

Use prestige system to get permanent bonuses for your stats. Reset current progress to proceed further next time!

ATMOSPHERE

Nice pixel graphics, calm ambient music and simple interface so that nothing distracts you from having fun.

COMPLETION

Will you be able to collect all the achievements and unlock all hidden features?
